variables.description: The ID of the Internet gateway.
variables.name: InternetGatewayId
variables.required: Conditional You must specify either InternetGatewayId or                VpnGatewayId, but not both.

variables.description: The ID of the VPC to associate with this gateway.
variables.name: VpcId

variables.description: The ID of the virtual private network (VPN) gateway to attach to the VPC.
variables.name: VpnGatewayId
variables.required: Conditional You must specify either                      InternetGatewayId or VpnGatewayId, but not both.
